Miami_Gardens.WLRN-FM: WLRN-FM is a class C1 FM station on 91.3 and is the main public radio station for South Florida and the Keys based in Miami. The station is owned by the Miami-Dade County Public Schools and is the area's flagship NPR member station, therefore carries Morning Edition, All Things Considered and Weekend Edition. It is also affiliated with Public Radio International and carries The Takeaway and The World, among others.
